verbose_text: Indeed, a study by Brazelle et al. XREF_BIBR in which various non small cell lung cancer cells were treated with 40 nM panobinostat documented a G2/M arrest but also noted a subtle increase in the phosphorylation of histone H3 at serine 10 and an increase in multinucleated cells that indicates mitotic catastrophe.
evidence: phosphorylation of histone H3 at serine 10
